sourcesContent:
import { createGlobalStyle } from 'styled-components'; 

export const lightTheme = {
    body: "#FFF",
    fontColor: "#000",
    logoStrip: "linear-gradient(to right, #337BD2, #A6C9F3)",
    mainTextColor: "black",
    secondaryTextColor: "gray",
    tertiaryTextColor: "snow",
    mainBackgroundColor: "snow",
    secondaryBackgroundColor: "#ECECEC;",
    mainBorder: "lightgray",
    background4: "#333333",
    background5: "#ECECEC",
    navHover: "black",
    userText: "snow",
    topnavBackground: "#333333",
    topnavBackgroundHover: "#555",
    userTextHover: "snow",
    gridHeaderBackground: "",
}

export const darkTheme = {
    logoStrip: "linear-gradient(to right, #092D54, #1D508F)",
    nightblack: "#1c1c1c",
    black0: "#000000",
    black05: "#171717",
    black1: "#1b1b1b",
    black2: "#363636",
    black3: "#565656",
    nightyellow: "#8A8700",
    nightred: "#7F0000",
    nightgreen: "#126200",
    nightpurple: "#350074",
    nightblue: "#092D54",
    nightblue2: "#1D508F",
    nightpink: "#740046",
    nightwhite: "#EBEBEB",
    nightwhite2: "#0f0f0f",
    userText: "#EBEBEB",
    topnavBackground: "#000000",
    topnavBackgroundHover: "#1b1b1b",
    userTextHover: "snow",
    gridHeaderBackground: "#363636",
}

export const GlobalStyles = createGlobalStyle`

    body {
        background-color: ${props => props.theme.body};
    }

`;
